heif.boxes

Class FileTypeBox

  • java.lang.Object
    • heif.boxes.Box
      • heif.boxes.FileTypeBox

  • public class FileTypeBox
extends Box
    The FileTypeBox must be the first box in every HEIF-based file, including HEIC still image files. It provides high-level file type information, including the major brand, minor version, and a list of compatible brands. For technical details, refer to ISO/IEC 14496-12:2015, Page 7 (File Type Box).

    API Note: Additional testing is required to validate the reliability and robustness of this implementation.

    Since:
    13 August 2025
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Trevor Maggs

      • FileTypeBox

        public FileTypeBox(Box box,
                   ByteStreamReader reader)
            throws java.io.IOException
        Constructs a FileTypeBox, parsing its fields from the specified ByteStreamReader.
        Parameters:
        box - the parent Box object containing size and type information
        reader - the byte reader for parsing box data
        Throws:

    • Method Detail

      • getMajorBrand

        public java.lang.String getMajorBrand()
        Returns the primary brand identifier. Typically, for HEIC-based files, the major brand is heic.
        Returns:
        the primary brand as a string

      • getMinorVersion

        public int getMinorVersion()
        Returns the minor version associated with the major brand.
        Returns:
        the minor version (usually 0 for HEIC files)

      • getCompatibleBrands

        public java.lang.String[] getCompatibleBrands()
        Returns an array of compatible brands as specified in the box, excluding the major brand.
        Returns:
        an array of compatible brand strings

      • hasBrand

        public boolean hasBrand(java.lang.String brand)
        Checks if the specified brand is listed in the compatible brands.
        Parameters:
        brand - the brand name to check
        Returns:
        boolean true if the brand is present, otherwise false

      • logBoxInfo

        public void logBoxInfo()
        Logs a single diagnostic line for this box at the debug level.

        This is useful when traversing the box tree of a HEIF/ISO-BMFF structure for debugging or inspection purposes.

        Overrides:
        logBoxInfo in class Box
